ControlName.val: 照会 - 受発注データ

ExpSyntax.val: CASE({0,1},1,'受注納期',3,'発注納期',5,'受注納期','伝票納期')
CASE({0,1},1,'受注データ検索',5,'見積データ検索','データ検索')

Text.val: ※キャッシュ無しにするとループするので注意！

ExpSyntax.val: {0,7}<>{0,16} AND (KbGet (1)='Next Row'EVENT OR KbGet (1)='Next Screen'EVENT) AND {0,23}=0
{0,7}<>{0,16} AND (KbGet (1)='Previous Row'EVENT OR KbGet (1)='Previous Screen'EVENT OR KbGet (0)=' ' AND KbGet (1)<>'Next Row'EVENT AND KbGet (1)<>'Next Screen'EVENT) AND {0,23}=0
CASE({1,1},1,'受注数量',3,'発注数量',5,'受注数量','数量 ')
